features.additionalInfo: It's for business customers who want to borrow a set amount of money to pay back over a set loan term up to 30 years for residentially secured loans
It's suitable for various business costs and investment purposes
It’s flexible to your needs. Choose a fixed or variable interest rate, your loan term, repayment frequency and type (interest only, principal and interest, or both), and loan security type
You can make additional repayments and access those funds later using redraw, so you can reduce the interest you pay over the life of your loan
Flexible repayment options include interest only, principal and interest, or a combination
Both variable and fixed rate repayment options could give you the flexibility you need to manage your cash flow
If you're on a variable interest rate, you can withdraw any extra repayments you make on your loan anytime
Redraw through NetBank, CommBiz, the CommBank app, in-branch or over the phone

eligibility.additionalInfo: Businesses of any size, including sole traders, partnerships, trusts and registered companies.
Groups or individuals using the lending facility for business purposes.

eligibility.additionalValue: You're more likely to be approved if:
eligibility.additionalInfo: You haven't been overdrawn or had your account in arrears anytime in the past 3 months.

eligibility.additionalValue: You're more likely to be approved if:
eligibility.additionalInfo: You haven't been declared bankrupt in the last 5 years.

eligibility.additionalValue: You're more likely to be approved if:
eligibility.additionalInfo: You haven't had any accounts in collections in the past 6 months.

eligibility.additionalValue: You're more likely to be approved if:
eligibility.additionalInfo: You have a minimum 30% deposit (for secure loans) as well as cash reserves to demonstrate that you can operate the business for at least the first 3 months.
Product not available for certain loan purposes, such as Self-Managed Super Funds and Commercial Property Investment or Development.

eligibility.additionalValue: SME Recovery Loan Scheme - How it works

Small to medium sized businesses with up to $250 million turnover, including those self-employed, and not-for-profit.
Must have an Australian Business Number (ABN).
Available to current and new CommBank business customers.
Must have received, or been entitiled to receive, a JobKeeper payment between 4 January 2021 and 28 March 2021, or have been adversely economically affected by the recent floods (March 2021).
Meet the eligibility criteria under the SME Recovery Loan Scheme.

fees.name: Loan establishment fee
fees.additionalValue: Minimum fee of $500 or 0.30% upfront whichever is higher.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Rates and fees differ based on the type of security you provide for your loan, your loan amount and other factors. We'll confirm what they are in your Letter of Offer.
Rates and fees differ based on the type of security you provide for your loan, your loan amount and other factors. We'll confirm what they are in your Letter of Offer.

To support our business customers, we will be offering loans of up to $5 million for eligible customers who have received, or been entitled to receive, a JobKeeper payment between 4 January 2021 and 28 March 2021, or have been adversely economically affected by the recent floods (March 2021). Applications can be made from 1 April 2021 to 31 December 2021. This loan must be used for business purposes or the purchase of commercial property, and is part of the Government SME Recovery Loan Scheme. Rates and fees differ based on the type of security you provide for your loan, your loan amount and other factors. We'll confirm what they are in your Letter of Offer.

Variable rate for unsecured loan. This loan must be used for business purposes or the purchase of commercial property, and is part of the Government SME Recovery Loan Scheme. Rates and fees differ based on the type of security you provide for your loan, your loan amount and other factors. We'll confirm what they are in your Letter of Offer.

Variable rate for unsecured loan with a repayment holiday. This loan must be used for business purposes or the purchase of commercial property, and is part of the Government SME Recovery Loan Scheme. Rates and fees differ based on the type of security you provide for your loan, your loan amount and other factors. We'll confirm what they are in your Letter of Offer.

Variable rate for secured loans. This loan must be used for business purposes or the purchase of commercial property, and is part of the Government SME Recovery Loan Scheme. Rates and fees differ based on the type of security you provide for your loan, your loan amount and other factors. We'll confirm what they are in your Letter of Offer.

Variable rate for secured loans with a repayment holiday. This loan must be used for business purposes or the purchase of commercial property, and is part of the Government SME Recovery Loan Scheme. Rates and fees differ based on the type of security you provide for your loan, your loan amount and other factors. We'll confirm what they are in your Letter of Offer.

Variable rate for unsecured and partially secured loans. This offer closes on the 30th June 2021. This loan must be used for business purposes or the purchase of commercial property, and is part of the Government SME Recovery Loan Scheme. Rates and fees differ based on the type of security you provide for your loan, your loan amount and other factors. We'll confirm what they are in your Letter of Offer.

Variable rate for secured loans. This offer closes on the 30th June 2021. This loan must be used for business purposes or the purchase of commercial property, and is part of the Government SME Recovery Loan Scheme. Rates and fees differ based on the type of security you provide for your loan, your loan amount and other factors. We'll confirm what they are in your Letter of Offer.

data.name: Better Business Loan
data.description: A simple loan to help you manage or grow your business. It can be secured or unsecured with flexible repayment options. For Businesses that want to borrow from $10,000 for business purposes, want to make extra repayments and access them with redraw, want to pay interest only on the amount they owe and want flexibility in how they repay their loan.
